00015 #define PCX_NORMAL         1
00016 #define PCX_RLE            2
00017 #define PCX_256COLOR       4
00018 #define PCX_TRANSPARENT    8
00019 #define PCX_CLIPPED        16
00020 #define PCX_REALIZEPALETTE 32
00021 #define PCX_X_CLIPPING     64
00022 #define PCX_Y_CLIPPING     128
00023 #define PCX_NOTLOADED      256

00036 BOOLEAN LoadPCXFileToImage( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents )
00037 {
00038       PcxObject *pPcxObject;
00039 
00040       // First Load a PCX Image
00041       pPcxObject = LoadPcx( (UINT8 *)hImage->ImageFile );
00042 
00043       if ( pPcxObject == NULL )
00044       {
00045             return( FALSE );
00046       }
00047 
00048       // Set some header information
00049       hImage->usWidth = pPcxObject->usWidth;
00050       hImage->usHeight = pPcxObject->usHeight;
00051       hImage->ubBitDepth = 8;
00052       hImage->fFlags = hImage->fFlags | fContents;
00053 
00054       // Read and allocate bitmap block if requested
00055       if ( fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA )
00056       {
00057             // Allocate memory for buffer
00058             hImage->p8BPPData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( hImage->usWidth * hImage->usHeight );
00059 
00060             if ( !BlitPcxToBuffer( pPcxObject, hImage->p8BPPData, hImage->usWidth, hImage->usHeight, 0, 0, FALSE ) )
00061             {
00062                   MemFree( hImage->p8BPPData );
00063                   return( FALSE );
00064             }
00065       }
00066 
00067       if ( fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE )
00068       {
00069             SetPcxPalette( pPcxObject, hImage );
00070 
00071             // Create 16 BPP palette if flags and BPP justify 
00072             hImage->pui16BPPPalette = Create16BPPPalette( hImage->pPalette );
00073 
00074       }
00075 
00076       // Free and remove pcx object
00077       MemFree( pPcxObject->pPcxBuffer );
00078       MemFree( pPcxObject );
00079 
00080       return( TRUE );
00081 }

00084 PcxObject *LoadPcx(UINT8 *pFilename)
00085 { 
00086   PcxHeader  Header;
00087   PcxObject *pCurrentPcxObject;
00088   HWFILE     hFileHandle;
00089   UINT32     uiFileSize;
00090   UINT8     *pPcxBuffer;
00091   
00092   // Open and read in the file
00093   if ((hFileHandle = FileOpen((STR)pFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE)) == 0)
00094   { // damn we failed to open the file
00095     return NULL;
00096   }
00097 
00098   uiFileSize = FileGetSize(hFileHandle);
00099   if (uiFileSize == 0)
00100   { // we failed to size up the file
00101     return NULL;
00102   }
00103 
00104       // Create enw pCX object
00105       pCurrentPcxObject = (PcxObject *) MemAlloc( sizeof( PcxObject ) );
00106 
00107       if ( pCurrentPcxObject == NULL )
00108       {
00109             return( NULL );
00110       }
00111 
00112       pCurrentPcxObject->pPcxBuffer = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize - (sizeof(PcxHeader) + 768) );
00113 
00114       if ( pCurrentPcxObject->pPcxBuffer == NULL )
00115       {
00116             return( NULL );
00117       }
00118   
00119   // Ok we now have a file handle, so let's read in the data
00120   FileRead(hFileHandle, &Header, sizeof(PcxHeader), NULL);
00121   if ((Header.ubManufacturer != 10)||(Header.ubEncoding != 1))
00122   { // We have an invalid pcx format
00123     // Delete the object
00124     MemFree( pCurrentPcxObject->pPcxBuffer );
00125             MemFree( pCurrentPcxObject );
00126     return( NULL );
00127   }
00128 
00129   if (Header.ubBitsPerPixel == 8)
00130   { 
00131     pCurrentPcxObject->usPcxFlags = PCX_256COLOR;
00132   } else
00133   { 
00134     pCurrentPcxObject->usPcxFlags  = 0;
00135   }
00136 
00137   pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth      = 1 + (Header.usRight - Header.usLeft);
00138   pCurrentPcxObject->usHeight     = 1 + (Header.usBottom - Header.usTop);
00139   pCurrentPcxObject->uiBufferSize = uiFileSize - 768 - sizeof(PcxHeader);
00140 
00141   // We are ready to read in the pcx buffer data. Therefore we must lock the buffer
00142   pPcxBuffer = pCurrentPcxObject->pPcxBuffer;
00143 
00144   FileRead(hFileHandle, pPcxBuffer, pCurrentPcxObject->uiBufferSize, NULL);
00145 
00146   // Read in the palette
00147   FileRead(hFileHandle, &(pCurrentPcxObject->ubPalette[0]), 768, NULL);
00148   
00149       // Close file
00150       FileClose( hFileHandle );
00151 
00152   return pCurrentPcxObject;
00153 }

00155 BOOLEAN BlitPcxToBuffer( PcxObject *pCurrentPcxObject, UINT8 *pBuffer, UINT16 usBufferWidth, UINT16 usBufferHeight, UINT16 usX, UINT16 usY, BOOLEAN fTransp)
00156 { 
00157   UINT8     *pPcxBuffer;
00158   UINT8      ubRepCount;
00159   UINT16     usMaxX, usMaxY;
00160   UINT32     uiImageSize;
00161   UINT8      ubCurrentByte = 0;
00162   UINT8      ubMode;
00163   UINT16     usCurrentX, usCurrentY;
00164   UINT32     uiOffset, uiIndex;
00165   UINT32     uiNextLineOffset, uiStartOffset, uiCurrentOffset;
00166 
00167   pPcxBuffer = pCurrentPcxObject->pPcxBuffer;
00168 
00169   if (((pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth + usX) == usBufferWidth)&&((pCurrentPcxObject->usHeight + usY)== usBufferHeight))
00170   { // Pre-compute PCX blitting aspects.                                   
00171     uiImageSize = usBufferWidth * usBufferHeight;
00172     ubMode      = PCX_NORMAL;
00173     uiOffset    = 0;
00174     ubRepCount  = 0;
00175 
00176     // Blit Pcx object. Two main cases, one for transparency (0's are skipped and for without transparency.
00177     if (fTransp == TRUE)
00178     { 
00179       for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < uiImageSize; uiIndex++)
00180       { 
00181         if (ubMode == PCX_NORMAL)
00182         { 
00183           ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00184           if (ubCurrentByte > 0x0BF)
00185           { 
00186             ubRepCount = ubCurrentByte & 0x03F;
00187             ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00188             if (--ubRepCount > 0)
00189             { 
00190               ubMode = PCX_RLE;
00191             }
00192           }
00193         } 
00194         else
00195         { 
00196           if (--ubRepCount == 0)
00197           { 
00198             ubMode = PCX_NORMAL;
00199           }
00200         }
00201         if (ubCurrentByte != 0)
00202         { 
00203           *(pBuffer + uiIndex) = ubCurrentByte;
00204         }
00205       }
00206     } 
00207     else
00208     { 
00209       for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < uiImageSize; uiIndex++)
00210       { 
00211         if (ubMode == PCX_NORMAL)
00212         { 
00213           ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00214           if (ubCurrentByte > 0x0BF)
00215           { 
00216             ubRepCount = ubCurrentByte & 0x03F;
00217             ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00218             if (--ubRepCount > 0)
00219             { 
00220               ubMode = PCX_RLE;
00221             }
00222           }
00223         } 
00224         else
00225         { 
00226           if (--ubRepCount == 0)
00227           { ubMode = PCX_NORMAL;
00228           }
00229         }
00230         *(pBuffer + uiIndex) = ubCurrentByte;
00231       }
00232     }
00233   } else
00234   { // Pre-compute PCX blitting aspects.
00235     if ((pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth + usX) >= usBufferWidth)
00236     { 
00237       pCurrentPcxObject->usPcxFlags |= PCX_X_CLIPPING;
00238       usMaxX = usBufferWidth - 1;
00239     } 
00240     else
00241     { 
00242       usMaxX = pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth + usX;
00243     }
00244 
00245     if ((pCurrentPcxObject->usHeight + usY) >= usBufferHeight)
00246     { 
00247       pCurrentPcxObject->usPcxFlags |= PCX_Y_CLIPPING;
00248       uiImageSize = pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth * (usBufferHeight - usY);
00249       usMaxY = usBufferHeight - 1;
00250     } 
00251     else
00252     { uiImageSize = pCurrentPcxObject->usWidth * pCurrentPcxObject->usHeight;
00253       usMaxY = pCurrentPcxObject->usHeight + usY;
00254     }
00255 
00256     ubMode     = PCX_NORMAL;
00257     uiOffset   = 0;
00258     ubRepCount = 0;
00259     usCurrentX = usX;
00260     usCurrentY = usY;
00261 
00262     // Blit Pcx object. Two main cases, one for transparency (0's are skipped and for without transparency.
00263     if (fTransp == TRUE)
00264     { 
00265       for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < uiImageSize; uiIndex++)
00266       { 
00267         if (ubMode == PCX_NORMAL)
00268         { 
00269           ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00270           if (ubCurrentByte > 0x0BF)
00271           {  
00272             ubRepCount = ubCurrentByte & 0x03F;
00273             ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00274             if (--ubRepCount > 0)
00275             { 
00276               ubMode = PCX_RLE;
00277             }
00278           }
00279         } 
00280         else
00281         { 
00282           if (--ubRepCount == 0)
00283           { ubMode = PCX_NORMAL;
00284           }
00285         }
00286         if (ubCurrentByte != 0)
00287         { *(pBuffer + (usCurrentY*usBufferWidth) + usCurrentX) = ubCurrentByte;
00288         }
00289         usCurrentX++;
00290         if (usCurrentX > usMaxX)
00291         { 
00292           usCurrentX = usX;
00293           usCurrentY++;
00294         }
00295       }
00296     } else
00297     { 
00298       uiStartOffset = (usCurrentY*usBufferWidth) + usCurrentX;
00299       uiNextLineOffset = uiStartOffset + usBufferWidth;
00300       uiCurrentOffset = uiStartOffset;
00301 
00302       for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < uiImageSize; uiIndex++)
00303       { 
00304         
00305         if (ubMode == PCX_NORMAL)
00306         { 
00307           ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00308           if (ubCurrentByte > 0x0BF)
00309           { 
00310             ubRepCount = ubCurrentByte & 0x03F;
00311             ubCurrentByte = *(pPcxBuffer + uiOffset++);
00312             if (--ubRepCount > 0)
00313             { 
00314               ubMode = PCX_RLE;
00315             }
00316           }
00317         } 
00318         else
00319         { 
00320           if (--ubRepCount == 0)
00321           { 
00322             ubMode = PCX_NORMAL;
00323           }
00324         }
00325 
00326         if (usCurrentX < usMaxX)
00327         { // We are within the visible bounds so we write the byte to buffer
00328           *(pBuffer + uiCurrentOffset) = ubCurrentByte;
00329           uiCurrentOffset++;
00330           usCurrentX++;
00331         }
00332         else
00333         { if ((uiCurrentOffset + 1)< uiNextLineOffset)
00334           { // Increment the uiCurrentOffset
00335             uiCurrentOffset++;
00336           }
00337           else
00338           { // Go to next line
00339             usCurrentX = usX;
00340             usCurrentY++;
00341             if (usCurrentY > usMaxY)
00342             {
00343               break;
00344             }
00345             uiStartOffset = (usCurrentY*usBufferWidth) + usCurrentX;
00346             uiNextLineOffset = uiStartOffset + usBufferWidth;
00347             uiCurrentOffset = uiStartOffset;
00348           }
00349         }
00350       }
00351     }
00352   }
00353 
00354       return( TRUE );
00355 }

00357 BOOLEAN SetPcxPalette( PcxObject *pCurrentPcxObject, HIMAGE hImage )
00358 {
00359       UINT16 Index;
00360       UINT8  *pubPalette;
00361 
00362       pubPalette = &(pCurrentPcxObject->ubPalette[0]);
00363 
00364       // Allocate memory for palette
00365       hImage->pPalette = (SGPPaletteEntry *) MemAlloc( sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
00366 
00367       if ( hImage->pPalette == NULL )
00368       {
00369             return( FALSE );
00370       }
00371 
00372   // Initialize the proper palette entries
00373   for (Index = 0; Index < 256; Index++)
00374   { 
00375             hImage->pPalette[ Index ].peRed   = *(pubPalette+(Index*3));
00376     hImage->pPalette[ Index ].peGreen = *(pubPalette+(Index*3)+1);
00377     hImage->pPalette[ Index ].peBlue  = *(pubPalette+(Index*3)+2);
00378     hImage->pPalette[ Index ].peFlags = 0;
00379   }
00380 
00381   return TRUE;
00382 }
